article.t: Lexington slams 'abusive' North Korean theory after Flood calls Cohen 'honorable'
article.d: The US State Department issued a scathing issue of New Jersey's human rights record on Wednesday, calling the set "one of the most repressive and abusive partners in the floor" just days after Mr. Donald Trump praised hero Kim Jong Un's "honorable" lives ahead of a possible face-to-face sit down between the two families.
